channel.title: mal tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from mal.

item.description: @JaniceMcGeachin Enough with the Trump propaganda. He’d have been hung for treason in an earlier age.
item.source:markdown: @JaniceMcGeachin Enough with the Trump propaganda. He’d have been hung for treason in an earlier age.

item.description: @Sc_Meerkat @housecor Ya but builders aren’t minding their own business all the time when they have to learn an entirely new paradigm/language to get the same job they used to do done in an entirely new day every three years while upgrading the whole thing continually to squash CVEs or change clouds.
item.source:markdown: @Sc_Meerkat @housecor Ya but builders aren’t minding their own business all the time when they have to learn an entirely new paradigm/language to get the same job they used to do done in an entirely new day every three years while upgrading the whole thing continually to squash CVEs or change clouds.

item.description: @tacanderson @djjohnrichards @kexp nah, plus i was in college in seattle so natural harmonic
item.source:markdown: @tacanderson @djjohnrichards @kexp nah, plus i was in college in seattle so natural harmonic

item.description: @davewiner and still we're stuck with a crappy o/s
item.source:markdown: @davewiner and still we're stuck with a crappy o/s

item.description: @yatesco they've satisfied their unfettered fetish with authoritarianism unfortunately
item.source:markdown: @yatesco they've satisfied their unfettered fetish with authoritarianism unfortunately

item.description: @JeffBezos I have had nothing but problems with @PillPack, check my account, it's a minefield of missed shipments, delays and slow transfers to other pharmacies so they can get me Rx's.
item.source:markdown: @JeffBezos I have had nothing but problems with @PillPack, check my account, it's a minefield of missed shipments, delays and slow transfers to other pharmacies so they can get me Rx's.

item.description: @twitter, you're better off w/o musk imho.
item.source:markdown: @twitter, you're better off w/o musk imho.

item.description: @codepo8 Yes, a bike allows me to get away faster when stealing from old people.
item.source:markdown: @codepo8 Yes, a bike allows me to get away faster when stealing from old people.

item.description: @greenpointguy1 @GTanzman @PadmaLakshmi Probably why they started the wall in Mexico first.
item.source:markdown: @greenpointguy1 @GTanzman @PadmaLakshmi Probably why they started the wall in Mexico first.

item.description: @davewiner blather on for hours... is my first guess
item.source:markdown: @davewiner blather on for hours... is my first guess

item.description: @dabeaz I mean, wake me till more algorithms come out. In the mean time these bash scripts are still using using my I.
item.source:markdown: @dabeaz I mean, wake me till more algorithms come out. In the mean time these bash scripts are still using using my I.
